title: Sut cyflwynwyd y ffurflen Treth Etifeddiant (IHT)
question: Sut cyflwynwyd y ffurflen Treth Etifeddiant (IHT)?
paragraph1: Dywedwch sut y bydd yn cael ei hanfon os nad ydych wedi gwneud hynny eisoes.
paragraph2: HMRC has closed the online ‘Register to complete an Inheritance Tax estate report’ service. However, if you submitted an IHT form using that HMRC service last year, you can still use the Inheritance Tax Identifier you received here.

method.required: Dewiswch drwy’r post neu wasanaeth ar-lein HMRC
